releases.name: BreakDownCans
releases.description: A tiny mod that lets your break down a recycled can for a single piece of scrap metal.

releases.name: CacheControl
releases.description: Lets you decide how many Prepper Caches should spawn in custom mode games.
releases.changes: Fixed a bug that made 'force_reroll_caches n' always spawn 0 caches

releases.name: Change-FPS-Limit
releases.description: Lets you change the game's FPS limit, which is usually locked at 120 FPS.

releases.name: DisableBreathEffect
releases.description: Removes the annoying 2D breath cloud that appears every few seconds when it's cold.

releases.name: EnableFeatProgressInCustomMode
releases.description: The v1.29 update turned off feat progress in custom mode games - this mod turns it back on.

releases.name: EnableStatusBarPercentages
releases.description: This mod re-enables some labels in the status / first aid screen that show a percentage value of how full the warmth, fatigue, thirst, hunger, and health status bars are.
releases.changes: Fixed the position of the percentage labels

releases.name: HungerRevamped
releases.description: Improves the hunger system by separating hunger and stored calories.
releases.changes: Replaced the missing hunger icon texture in the status screen

releases.name: IncreaseSaveSlotLimit
releases.description: Increases the number of save slots you can have to 999 (from 25)

releases.name: InterloperRegionSelection
releases.description: Lets you select the spawn region in Interloper mode.

releases.name: ModSettings
releases.description: Lets other mods display their settings in-game. This mod doesn't do anything on its own and should only be used as a dependency for other mods.
releases.changes: Added RefreshGUI method, sort mod settings tabs alphabetically, more and better organized examples

releases.name: RememberBreakDownItem
releases.description: This mod remembers the tool you last used to break down furniture. That way, you no longer need to constantly switch from "using a knife" to "no tool" when breaking down branches or curtains.

releases.name: ShorterReadingIntervals
releases.description: A mod that lets you research for shorter amounts of time and lets you interrupt research at any time without losing progress.

releases.name: TLD-Bugfixes
releases.description: A mod that fixes some bugs and exploits in the game.

releases.name: WildlifeBegone
releases.description: This mod removes most of the animals that would usually roam the world and greatly increases their respawn times, thus making you play The Long Dark quite a bit differently.
releases.changes: Added setting to enable WildlifeBegone in story mode, bug fixes
